title: Whitney Port goes retro in polka dots with Jamie Chung at Odwalla launch event in Beverly Hills
text:
Whitney Port has becomes somewhat of a lifestyle guru for her 1.5 million Instagram followers.

And she showed her love for health smoothies Tuesday at Odwalla's Zero Sugar Shack launch.

She cut a retro chic look in black and white as she arrived at the popup in Beverly Hills.

Retro chic: Whitney Port cut a retro chic look in black and white Tuesday as she arrived at the Odwalla Zero Sugar Shack popup launch event in Beverly Hills

Port served '80s glam in a white button-down mini dress, which featured puffy shoulders and black polka dots.

She paired the dress with some black patent leather strappy platform heels with white stitching.

The 34-year-old completed the look with a diamond nameplate necklace, featuring her son Sonny's name.

She sported a fresh-faced beauty look with a sparkling eyeshadow and a glossy pout.

'80s glam: She served '80s glam in a white button-down mini dress, which featured puffy shoulders and black polka dots

Sonny: The 34-year-old completed the look with a diamond nameplate necklace, featuring her son Sonny's name

Red claws: Port added a subtle splash of color to her funky fierce look with a fresh red manicure

Stepping out: Port carried a black mesh tote bag as she stepped out of her car at the promotional event. She paired the dress with some black patent leather strappy platform heels with white stitching

Serving glam: She sported a fresh-faced beauty look with a sparkling eyeshadow and a glossy pout

Port added a subtle splash of color to her funky fierce look with a fresh red manicure.

She carried a black mesh tote bag as she stepped out of her car at the promotional event.

Jamie Chung was also in attendance at the popup, putting on a dazzling display in red.

She flaunted her taut midriff in a red bandeau with a matching choker and high-waisted trousers.

The actress completed the look with a pair of pointed stilettos with black jewels, as she carried a petite white alligator handbag.

Lady in red: Jamie Chung was also in attendance at the popup, putting on a dazzling display in red

Taut midriff: She flaunted her taut midriff in a red bandeau with a matching choker and high-waisted trousers
description: Whitney Port put on a retro '80s display Tuesday as she joined Jamie Chung at Odwalla's Zero Sugar Shack popup launch party in Beverly Hills. They posed in front of a wall of smoothies at the event.
